start.header: Cancel an application and get your documents back

legal-representation.p1: To continue this form, you must have previously
legal-representation.link: sent the Home Office a letter of authority

cannot-travel.header: You cannot use this passport to travel

further-leave.header: Further leave to remain (permission to stay)
further-leave.p1: There are different categories of further leave to remain (also called permission to stay), depending on your circumstances.
further-leave.link-read-more: Read more about the types of further leave
further-leave.p2: to check which one you applied for.
further-leave.p3: You will have used an online form called ‘FLR’ to apply. You will have applied from inside the UK.

request-received.para1: We have sent email confirmation to {{values.contact-email}}.
request-received.para2: If you need your documents for travel, do not book tickets until you have them back.
request-received.para3: The Home Office may contact you if they need more information.
request-received.para4: They will review your request and decide whether they can cancel your application or send your documents back to you.
request-received.info: If you have asked for your documents back, it normally takes 10 working days to return them
request-received.header2: If you have cancelled your application
request-received.para5: If you have cancelled your application, you might be able to
request-received.para6: This depends on when you cancelled your application.
request-received.header3: If you need to cancel this request
request-received.para7: There is an online service if you need to

enter-main-applicant-address.intro: This must match the applicant’s address in Home Office records. The address must be a UK address.

declaration.intro-2: if I cancel an application, the fee may not be refunded
